moduleMetadataJson.name: Windows Disconnect Wireless Connection
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module disconnects the current wireless network connection
        on the specified interface.
author: theLightCosine <theLightCosine@metasploit.com>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: Interface
options.description: The Index of the Interface to Disconnect. Leave at 0 if only one IF
